document_data.caption: The islands of Al-Zira in the Djinni's Claws.
document_data.name: Al-Zira
document_data.mainbody: '''Al-Zira''', or the '''Arm''', formed the large islands of the [[Djinni's Claws]] in the [[Crowded Sea]] southwest of mainland [[Zakhara]].
document_data.Inhabitants: All kinds of [[genie]]s could be found on the islands of Al-Zira. [[Marid]] enjoyed the warm coral lagoons, [[djinn]] flew through the air with the birds, and [[dao]] explored the rocky mountains.  The [[efreet]] were the only major form of genie not found on the island.
document_data.Rumors and Legends: These islands were widely feared because they were believed to be owned by the marid.
